taskDefinition.name: Salesforce Contact Update
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Updates a Salesforce Contact record with the given parameters and returns the Contact Id of the updated Contact record. The parameters are mapped directly to their respective fields.

parameter.label: Contact Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the Salesforce Contact record that will be updated

parameter.label: Salutation
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Salutation field of the Contact record

parameter.label: First Name
parameter.tooltip: Sets the First Name field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Last Name
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Last Name field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Title
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Title field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Department
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Department field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Mailing Street
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Mailing Street field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Mailing City
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Mailing City field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Mailing State/Province
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Mailing State/Province field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Mailing Zip/Postal Code
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Mailing Zip/Postal Code field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Mailing Country
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Mailing Country field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Phone
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Phone field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Home Phone
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Home Phone field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Mobile
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Mobile field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Fax
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Fax field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Email
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Email field of the Contact record

parameter.label: Description
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Description field of the Contact record
